data.actual_result: The new member message is actually shown in your Phone's Language instead of Discord's
data.expected_result: The new member message should be shown in yours Discord's Language
data.short_description: Discord Mobile Notifications showing join messages on phone's language
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your phone's language to something else than your Discord's Language - Have mobile push notifications and a Discord Default "New Member Messages" channel on - Have someone to join it - Look at your Phone's notifications, you can see that it's in the Phone's instead of Discord's Language
